name: NYDailyNews
text:
OPINION | Cuomo, no stranger to producing embarrassing political posters, has done it again, this time saluting his own leadership and the achievements of New York State in the coronavirus crisis.

https://t.co/ElCDROMyKB

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The current average cost of divorce is $15,500. 

Should the split, as many do, require litigation instead of mediation, the average cost jumps to $19,600. 

Divorces take nearly 11 months to resolve without litigation and nearly 18 months if litigated.
https://t.co/Lt9FnkEmv4

name: NYDailyNews
text:
NYC's congestion pricing plan will be delayed by roughly a year thanks to holdups by the Trump administration, the MTA's construction chief says. 

https://t.co/JLBAc8TAdy

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: People arriving at N.Y.’s airports from 19 states where virus cases are rapidly rising will be met by “peace officers.” 

They must provide 
— destinations
— contact info
— a guarantee to self-quarantine for 2 weeks 

Fines and summonses are in order.
https://t.co/AXm2bju99Y

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: EDITORIAL | No mask, no ride. 

Gov. Cuomo signed up Chris Rock and Rosie Perez to spread the word about stopping the spread. 

The MTA has to do a better job of letting passengers know it's not a suggestion.
https://t.co/J0vsOqfSmT

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: “She just fell. I turned around, and I opened fire too. But that’s just a reaction.”

This young mother was fatally shot in Indiana and may have been targeted for saying “all lives matter,” the 24-year-old’s family said.
https://t.co/7nSRJVbdMa

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz was spotted by a fellow passenger on an American Airlines flight without a mask in defiance of the airline’s policy that all travelers must wear face coverings.
https://t.co/GHDv9UImBL

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Rep. Glenn Grothman had a severe coughing fit during a speech on the House floor. 

But it was caused by a dry throat, not COVID, says his campaign manager. 

https://t.co/C86l3LNmjj
